All Classes

Class Description
AvailabilityException
This exception is called when a Wine is not available
Customer
The Customer class defines the behavior of the User type Customer.
CustomerNotification
The CustomerNotification class manages the notifications for when the wine is back in stock.
Employee
The Employee class defines the behavior of the User type Customer.
IAuthentication
The IAuthentication interface include the method for the User authentication.
IObservable<T>
The IObservable is use to implement the observer pattern.
IObserver
The IObserver is use to implement the observer pattern.
IStoreManager<T>
The IStoreManager extends the IWarehouseManager adding additional behaviour for manage the elements.
IUserManager
The IUserManager interface contain the method to manage a user.
IWarehouseManager<T>
The IWarehouseManager is a generic interface that include the principal service for the Warehouse
LogMessages
The LogMessages class define the output messages of the system
main
Is the main class of the system
NotFoundException
This exception is called when something is not found
Order
The Order class rappresent an order of wine
Params
Enum to set the params of Map when passing parameters
ProvisioningManager
The ProvisioningManger is use to notify the Employees when when a certain wine is finished
RequiredValueException
This exception is called when a value is required but is not present
Type
Enum to set the type of the user
User
The User is an abstract class.
Vineyard
The Vineyard class contains the info of the vineyard
Warehouse
The Warehouse is a class used to manage the stocks of the wine.
Wine
The Wine class has the method to manage the wine.
WineBuilder
The @WineBuilder class is a alternative implementation of the build pattern for create the Wine
WineShop
The WineShop is a class for the manage the wine and people inside the shop.
